articles.description: Skipper Heather Knight wants England players to ‘go and dominate’ ahead of the ICC Women's T20 World Cup 2024
articles.content:
"You want to see England players go and dominate, and really put their name forward to keep being in that England side," she said.

articles.title: IPL 2024: Mohammad Nabi shares, then deletes fan's post criticising MI captain Hardik - India Today
articles.description: IPL 2024 Mohammad Nabi shared a post criticising Hardik Pandya039s captaincy during MI039s match against PBKS before deleting it MI won the last-over thriller against PBKS by 9 runs at the Mullanpur Stadium
articles.content: MI's Afghanistan star Mohammad Nabi shared a fan's post criticizing MI captain Hardik Pandya's leadership in the ongoing IPL 2024 and then deleted it. The Instagram user may have used Nabi's picture,… [+1774 chars]
